Pre-Installation

This section is incomplete and needs further work! OpenBSD usage needs to be specified instead of Linux usage!

Download

  1. Navigate to OpenBSD Mirrors and select HTTP(s) mirror.
  2. Download files:
    1. Public key: <VERSION>/openbsd-<VERSION>-base.pub
    2. Disk image: <VERSION>/amd64/install<VERSION>.iso.
    3. Sigend signature list: <VERSION>/amd64/SHA256.sig.
    4. Installation notes: <VERSION>/amd64/INSTALL.amd64.
  3. Verify if disk image and signature list files are genuine:

    $

Flash USB

  1. Make sure the USB filesystem is not mounted!
  2. Flash USB with disk image:

    # dd if=install<VERSION>.iso of=</dev/sdX> status=progress ; sync

USB Boot

  1. Reboot the system and during the POST phase press BIOS key1) to boot into UEFI.
  2. Make sure that Secure Boot is disabled and reboot.
  3. On next POST phase, press Boot Menu key2) and select (UEFI) USB entry.
1) , 2)
List of POST keys according to vendor: http://www.disk-image.com/faq-bootmenu.htm.
